item.title: SOFI
item.description: score:169 Chances: SoFi stock looks expensive in 2024, but you don’t have to look far out to see that this stock could quickly turn cheap. After an unconvincing start to the quarter for tech stocks, more optimism is beginning to shine through. SoFi management expects earnings to grow robustly over several years.
